h2_title: Black Loong Boss Fight and Guide
content: When the Black Loong falls, you’ll earn plenty of rewards, including a Loong Pearl, Mind Core, 2 Refined Iron Sand, 1576 Will, and 2770 Experience. In addition to this, you can find a gold chest nearby that contains a Tridacna Pendant curio, and a Thunderbone weapon material — one of two Loong materials needed to craft the Loongwreathe Staff!
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Black_Loong.md', within the main section titled 'Black Loong', specifically from the subsection 'Black Loong Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
When the Black Loong falls, you’ll earn plenty of rewards, including a Loong Pearl, Mind Core, 2 Refined Iron Sand, 1576 Will, and 2770 Experience. In addition to this, you can find a gold chest nearby that contains a Tridacna Pendant curio, and a Thunderbone weapon material — one of two Loong materials needed to craft the Loongwreathe Staff!
